## pasteCommand() function

Command to read from the system clipboard. Resolves to a PasteMsg on success or PasteErrorMsg on failure.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function pasteCommand(): Cmd<PasteMsg | PasteErrorMsg>;
```
**Returns:**

[Cmd](./tea.cmd.md)<!-- -->&lt;[PasteMsg](./textarea.pastemsg.md) \| [PasteErrorMsg](./textarea.pasteerrormsg.md)<!-- -->&gt;
